name: mbon-dash-2025
description: MBON Marine Biodiversity Dashboard - Exploring acoustic indices as biodiversity predictors

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "DASHBOARD,INFO" -c "cyan,green" "npm run dev:dashboard" "echo '\nðŸŒŠ MBON Dashboard started at http://localhost:3000 - ish\n'"
scripts.data:test: cd python && uv run mbon-analysis test-dashboard
scripts.data:stations: cd python && uv run mbon-analysis generate-views --view stations
scripts.data:views: cd python && uv run mbon-analysis generate-views
scripts.data:process: npm run data:test && npm run data:views
scripts.data:compile: cd python && uv run mbon-analysis compile-indices
scripts.data:migrate: cd python && uv run mbon-analysis migrate-data
scripts.data:all: echo 'Will process all data and generate all views'
scripts.build: npm run data:process && cd dashboard && npm run build
scripts.setup: npm run setup:python && npm run setup:dashboard && npm install
scripts.setup:python: cd python && uv sync --dev && uv run pre-commit install
scripts.test: npm run test:python && npm run test:dashboard
scripts.test:data: cd python && uv run mbon-analysis test-dashboard --check-api
scripts.lint:python: cd python && uv run ruff check . && uv run black --check . && uv run isort --check-only .
scripts.lint:python:fix: cd python && uv run ruff check --fix . && uv run black . && uv run isort .
scripts.format:python: cd python && uv run black . && uv run isort .

author: MBON Team
